name: LeishmaniasisTestsForLeishmaniaSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Leishmaniasis (Tests for Leishmania species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Leishmaniasis nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Leishmania nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
